reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting students who have failed for financial reasons and who did not receive graduation documents due to financial dues in Malaysia (Albania).

description.narrative: 1. Providing financial support for defaulting students who did not receive graduation documents due to financial dues. 2. Selecting outstanding and defaulting students for financial reasons according to specific criteria (the academic stage - the academic average - the date of registration - the accreditation and recognition of the university in the country of the students). 3. Paying the financial dues for students from countries affected by disasters and crises and those in difficult need who are facing difficulty in paying their tuition fees.
Submit graduation documents from the bachelor's stage to a number of one student who stumbled for financial reasons from the state (Albania).

Supporting Al-Madinah International University in Malaysia (a private university) by paying the financial dues to defaulting students in completing their academic career and enabling them to receive graduation documents, which will provide them with greater opportunities and open the possibility for them to obtain professions that help them in their countries.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
